memory_agent_registry_agent.description: Scans the memory/_memory_agents folder and updates the memory_agent_registry.json file.

memory_agent_router_agent.description: Handles routing of queries to appropriate memory agents based on keywords.

memory_decay_agent.description: Promotes aged working memory files into short-term and long-term storage.

memory_recall_agent.description: Searches short-term index → filters summaries → fetches long-term memory files.

memory_summarize_agent.description: Summarizes memory logs or indexed content using GPT into markdown bullet points.
